segments.text: I'd like to send this parcel to Spain , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to send it by airmail or by surface mail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , how long will it take if I send it by surface mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , dear . It won't get there for New Year's Day if I send it by surface mail . How much will it cost if I send it by air ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a moment . I'll weigh it .
segments.speaker: S2
